column5: A letter from a husband to his wife after a heated discussion about the Honey-do list:  I guess that sometimes I feel like you are pushing me too hard when you want something.  I realize that I was wrong and I am apologizing for being such a hard-headed guy.  All I want is for you to be happy and be able to enjoy the holiday season.  Nothing brightens the Christmas spirit like Christmas lights!  I took the time to hang the lights for you today and now I will be off fishing.  Again, I am very sorry for the way I acted yesterday.  I'll be home later.  Love you……
LMAO !!!  OFC members have very long memories !!!!! Too funny Sinclair

Joanne's been bugging me for days to put up the lights. No time 'cause I've been fishing.  This is so ironic you posted this.  I'm going to email her this pic right now and ask her if that meets her satisfaction.
Easy Up / Easy Down.  That's the way to do it.
Too funny! Just adding another pic appropriate to this thread! For all those too busy fishing to put up lights, here is another alternative!
And I'm 100% certain he came home from fishing to a romantic candle lit dinner.
You know what they say about Christmas lights....  They are like ____________________________  Half of them don't work and the other half aren't too bright....LOL...
Yeah ... and I'll bet teh guy ran his extension code over to the neighbor's as well.

Lol, those pictures are hilarious.  Just down the street there are two houses that have gone all out like that picture in Miracons post.  The funny thing is there is 1 house between the two, lol. I think I might have to go visit that house and bring them that photo!

A guy just a few blocks from us even has his own web site, Wright's Lights. There's 3 houses together on that street who go all-out, they can probably be seen from the space station. They collect for food banks, if you go to see them take some cans.

OMG! The comments and other pics on here are hysterical! Love Old Man and Skippers pics!!   For anyone interested, this is a house that goes all out at Halloween and are quite famous on YouTube. If you haven't seen it yet, it's a Must See! Check out their other videos too.
